measured_by: 5-point Likert-scale agreement items about AI’s ability to explain its decisions
justification: The authors report that participants rated statements such as “In order for me to trust an AI, that AI must be able to explain why it makes decisions” on a Likert scale from 1 (Strongly disagree) to 5 (Strongly agree), and give the average score (3.72), indicating that trust was assessed with these Likert-scale items.
